Answer:

Sure.

Two Cars

Here is the program with a few more blank lines: 


class Car
{
  . . . .
}

class MilesPerGallon
{
  public static void main( String[] args ) 
  {
    Car car1 = new Car( 32456, 32810, 10.6 );
    System.out.println( "Miles per gallon of car 1 is " + car1.calculateMPG() );

    Car car2 = new Car( , ,   );

    System.out.println( "Miles per gallon of car 2 is " + car2.calculateMPG() );

  }
}

QUESTION 13:

Fill in the blanks for the second car, which has

  • A starting odometer reading of 100000
  • An ending odometer reading of 100300
  • Gas consumption of 12.5 gallons.
